title: Drawing, "Sketch.  View of a part of the town; study, gateway in Guaranda, Ecuador", June 3, 1857
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at various locations: white / W / yerba / mustard; again, at upper right: Gateway at Guaranda; and at lower center:  Guaranda June 3d / 57 / Part of X.
description: Horizontal view with houses visible at left against a mountainous background and a masonry gateway with lath gate visible at upper right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketch.  View of a part of the town; study, gateway in Guaranda, Ecuador", June 3, 1857.
June 3, 1857. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-189.
